price: Saa nkorͻfoͻ no na yεbεma wͻn akatua mprenu εnam aboterε a wͻnyaeε no ho nti, na wͻde papa si bͻne ho kwan, na deε Yεde akyε wͻn no nso wͻyi mu bi de ma.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يُؤۡتَوۡنَ أَجۡرَهُم مَّرَّتَيۡنِ بِمَا صَبَرُواْ وَيَدۡرَءُونَ بِٱلۡحَسَنَةِ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: ulāika yu'tawna ajrahum marratayni bimā ṣabarū wayadraūna bil-ḥasanati al-sayi-ata wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
